title: Beauty as Intelligibility and Revelation
description:
@Jordan B Peterson with @Bret Weinstein  and Heather Heying https://youtu.be/jKh0ni7HlNw

The one released with Sam  @Transfigured  and  @John Vervaeke  https://youtu.be/QsH8droSN1Y
And one  with The Marylander. https://youtu.be/bjljZ1ktPvk
On my channel tomorrow.

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/De8gqfJW
